Dominion [startdom]: 1

The Maha is a rishi who has attained enlightenment and has mastered his own mortality. Donning a godly mantle, he has taken the role of a Pretender God. The Maharishi is a master of magic and can be adept in several of the magic paths. The Maharishi is a exceptional master of astral rituals and he can project his astral magic much farther than other mages.
